$interpreted: Sophie: ...Sanchez. Did you sell us out?
Sanchez: I-I-I just m-m-made a deal with the High Priest!
Rune: A...deal?
Sanchez: The High Priest said he'd give me enough money to leave this place. I was just supposed to make sure you couldn't find Elio.
Sophie: You know where Elio is? Take us to him!
Sanchez: There's no way. He's injured. I don't even know if he's alive.
Sophie: Injured? What happened to him!?
Sanchez: ...It was only by chance that I saw...
Sanchez: Since the New City is currently closed off to the public, the High Priest used it to trap the last group of visitors leaving the Shrine.
Sanchez: It felt like the High Priest was selectively choosing who he wanted to kidnap...
Sanchez: If I'm not mistaken, he was mumbling something..."In groups...", "Test subjects", or something like that...
Sophie: Where'd he take those people?
Sanchez: I don't know! I didn't see...I was afraid I would be caught, so I ran.
Sophie: So you saw with your own eyes that Elio was kidnapped!?
Sanchez: Beeswax! If I went in to save him, I'd be dead. I may be a piece of trash, but I still want to live!
Sophie: You little...
Sanchez: I didn't do anything wrong! Rune, why are you hitting me? I didn't do anything! I just want to get away from here!
Sanchez: I didn't do anything!
Sanchez: I! Didn't! Do! Anything!
Clark: Maria, please keep Rune under control.
Maria: Yes, sir! This is Maria's area of expertise!
Rune: Sanchez!!!! ArghH!!!
Clark: Sanchez, think carefully...do you have any information on the High Priest?
Sanchez: A while ago, I helped Yusuf with some things at the "Oasis Casino".
Sophie: Oasis Casino...?
Sanchez: When Yusuf was drunk, he tried to barge into the High Priest's room. I'll never forget it, he came out with the crap beaten out of him.
Sanchez: That's all I can remember.
Sophie: A casino...and the High Priest has his own room?
Sanchez: Yusuf said that the High Priest was the one pulling the strings. But that's not all. He even let Yusuf smuggle in illegal drugs...
Clark: Illegal drugs? What for?
Joan: So who wants to go check it out? That suspicious casino, I've been researching it for a long time now!
Clark: Oh. You're still here. So...who are you exactly?
Joan: Joan Hawke, at your service! The one they call "The Thief of the Gleaming Star", yes, it is I.
Sophie: You've been researching the Oasis Casino? Why?
Joan: My master was captured at the casino...so I plan on sneaking into the Oasis Casino and breaking master out of there!
Sophie: So you plan on...sneaking into the Oasis Casino!?
Joan: Do you know who I am?
Joan: Whether it's investigating secret passageways, picking locks or scaling walls, the Gleaming Star can do it all! Now let's go!!!
Clark: Even though she looks more suspicious than a politician, we really have no other choice.
Sophie: I agree. As long as I can figure out what happened to Elio, I don't care how dangerous it is, I'm willing to try.
Sophie: Joan, we're counting on you!
Joan: The early worm gets the bird, so we'd best head out right away!
Sophie: Rune...
Rune: Sophie...water is coming out of Rune's eyes...my chest...is hurting...why?
Sophie: Rune...those are tears...
Sophie: You must be crying...because you're mad at Sanchez...and you're sad.
Sophie: Rune...let's go.
Rune: Oh, so you all are SO much better than me, huh!? Well I'm sorry I'm not perfect! I don't care about you anyway.......I mean it...
Sanchez: Beeswax!
Sanchez: Bees...WAX! Dirty, sinky, stupid, good-for-nothings...HEY!!!

Model.Text: ...Sanchez. Did you sell us out?
I-I-I just m-m-made a deal with the High Priest!
A...deal?
The High Priest said he'd give me enough money to leave this place. I was just supposed to make sure you couldn't find Elio.
You know where Elio is? Take us to him!
There's no way. He's injured. I don't even know if he's alive.
Injured? What happened to him!?

Since the New City is currently closed off to the public, the High Priest used it to trap the last group of visitors leaving the Shrine.
It felt like the High Priest was selectively choosing who he wanted to kidnap...
If I'm not mistaken, he was mumbling something..."In groups...", "Test subjects", or something like that...

You little...
I didn't do anything wrong! Rune, why are you hitting me? I didn't do anything! I just want to get away from here!
I didn't do anything!
I! Didn't! Do! Anything!
Maria, please keep Rune under control.
Yes, sir! This is Maria's area of expertise!
Sanchez!!!! ArghH!!!
Sanchez, think carefully...do you have any information on the High Priest?
A while ago, I helped Yusuf with some things at the "Oasis Casino".

That's all I can remember.
A casino...and the High Priest has his own room?
Yusuf said that the High Priest was the one pulling the strings. But that's not all. He even let Yusuf smuggle in illegal drugs...
Illegal drugs? What for?
So who wants to go check it out? That suspicious casino, I've been researching it for a long time now!
Oh. You're still here. So...who are you exactly?
Joan Hawke, at your service! The one they call "The Thief of the Gleaming Star", yes, it is I.

My master was captured at the casino...so I plan on sneaking into the Oasis Casino and breaking master out of there!
So you plan on...sneaking into the Oasis Casino!?
Do you know who I am?

Even though she looks more suspicious than a politician, we really have no other choice.
I agree. As long as I can figure out what happened to Elio, I don't care how dangerous it is, I'm willing to try.
Joan, we're counting on you!
The early worm gets the bird, so we'd best head out right away!
Rune...
Sophie...water is coming out of Rune's eyes...my chest...is hurting...why?
Rune...those are tears...
You must be crying...because you're mad at Sanchez...and you're sad.
Rune...let's go.
Oh, so you all are SO much better than me, huh!? Well I'm sorry I'm not perfect! I don't care about you anyway.......I mean it...
Beeswax!
Bees...WAX! Dirty, sinky, stupid, good-for-nothings...HEY!!!
